## Bug Report / Feature Request

**Type:** Bug / Feature Request (delete one)

### Description

A clear description of the bug or feature.

### Steps to Reproduce (bugs only)

1. Run `...`
2. See error `...`

### Expected Behavior

What should happen.

### Actual Behavior

What actually happens.

### Environment

- OS: (macOS / Linux / Windows)
- Python version: (output of `python3 --version`)
- Claude Code version: (output of `claude --version`)
- Number of sessions: (approximate)

### Additional Context

Any other relevant information, error output, or screenshots.
